thread.title: Suzette Karen Andres
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Suzette Karen Andres

author: Suzette Karen Andres
title: Suzette Karen Andres
text: The trip exceeded our expectations. Michael Rigillo at GOWAY Travel planned an interesting itinerary that allowed us to visit the key cities within Andalusia with tours at key places, booked cars and arranged accommodation that was well located and (mostly) met our high standards. The trip flowed logically with an appropriate amount of time spent in each location.
